{{Actor| | type = Armor | name = Falcon shield | class = FalconShield | game = Hexen | doomednum = 8006 | spawnid = 69 | spawnname = T_FALCONSHIELD }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Armor|Armor]]→[[Classes:HexenArmor|HexenArmor]]→FalconShield
The Falcon Shield is similar to Heretic's [[Classes:EnchantedShield|Enchanted Shield]]. It is emblazoned with a displayed argent falcon on a sable field, and surrounded by a brass lining. It increases a Hexen player class's Armor Class by a certain amount: * +5 for Parias the Cleric * +4 for Baratus the Fighter * +3 for Daedolon the Mage In Hexen, it is designed to be used with the [[Classes:AmuletOfWarding|Amulet of Warding]], [[Classes:MeshArmor|Mesh Armor]] and [[Classes:PlatinumHelm|Platinum Helm]], but if imported in another game only one piece of [[Classes:HexenArmor|Hexen Armor]] can be used at a time. In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named ARM2A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR FalconShield : {{Class|HexenArmor}} { +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} {{Property|Health}} 1 // Armor class {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 0 {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARMOR2" // "FALCON SHIELD" States { Spawn: AR_2 A -1 Stop } } ==Related Classes== [[Classes:ArtiBoostArmor|ArtiBoostArmor]], called in-game the Dragonskin Bracers, enhance a character's Hexen Armor class.
